content: Updated Recommended List SEO Events By: Rand Fishkin December 21, 2005 The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Table of Contents Copied! By: Rand Fishkin December 21, 2005 Updated Recommended List SEO Events The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. I've re-created the old recommended SEO firms list here - Recommended SEO, Web Development & Support Firms. If you know that you should be on there, but aren't listed, drop me a line. Likewise if you find errors, omissions or want to be listed in a different category. I'm referring 4-6 people every day now, so hopefully you'll get some good business out of it. Happy Holidays, to all! I'm off to Florida to celebrate Christmas with my girlfriend's family and have them help me celebrate Hanukkah (which reminds me; I still have to pack my menorah). I expect to blog 1-2X a day down there, thanks to a new Verizon broadband card :) Copied! Back to Top
